column4: Plaintiff in tech hiring suit asks judge to reject settlement
column5: One of the plaintiffs in a lawsuit that accuses tech firms including Apple Inc and Google Inc of conspiring to hold down salaries has asked the court to reject a $324 million settlement negotiated by his own lawyers.

column4: Apple tries to lift online sales by cutting refund times in half
